org.purewidgets.client.im
Class InteractionManagerService

java.lang.Object
  org.purewidgets.client.im.InteractionManagerService

public class InteractionManagerService
extends Object

The InteractionManagerService represents the services available at the interaction manager server. This class is mainly for the internal use of the PuReWidgets toolkit. In general, application should not need to use it directly.

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

Constructor Summary
InteractionManagerService(String interactionServerUrl, LocalStorage localStorage)
          Creates a new InteractionManagerService that uses the interaction manager specified by the interactionServerUrl and the specified application's LocalStorage.

Constructor Detail

InteractionManagerService

public InteractionManagerService(String interactionServerUrl,
                                 LocalStorage localStorage)
Creates a new InteractionManagerService that uses the interaction manager specified by the interactionServerUrl and the specified application's LocalStorage.

Parameters:
interactionServerUrl - The base Url of the interaction manager server.
localStorage - The application's LocalStorage.
Method Detail

deleteAllWidgets

public void deleteAllWidgets(String placeId,
                             String applicationId,
                             String callingApplicationId,
                             AsyncCallback<ArrayList<Widget>> callback)
Deletes all widgets of the specified application. The deleleted widgets are returned in the callback.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id of the application of which to delete all widgets.
applicationId - The application id of the application of to delete all widgets.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

addWidgetToServer

public void addWidgetToServer(String placeId,
                              String applicationId,
                              String callingApplicationId,
                              ArrayList<Widget> widgets,
                              AsyncCallback<ArrayList<Widget>> callback)
Adds a list of widgets to the specified application. The added widgets are returned back in the callback.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id of the application to which the widgets will be added.
applicationId - The application id of the application to which the widgets will be added.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
widgets - The widgets to add.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

getInputFromServer

public void getInputFromServer(String placeId,
                               String applicationId,
                               String callingApplicationId,
                               String from,
                               AsyncCallback<ArrayList<WidgetInput>> callback)
Asks for input to the specified application.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id of the application from which we want to receive input.
applicationId - The application id of the application from which we want to receive input.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
from - A timestamp defining the oldest allowed timestamp in the input to be received.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

removeWidget

public void removeWidget(String placeId,
                         String applicationId,
                         String callingApplicationId,
                         ArrayList<Widget> widgets,
                         AsyncCallback<ArrayList<Widget>> callback)
Deletes a list of widgets from the specified application. The deleted widgets are returned back in the callback.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id of the application from which the widgets will be deleted.
applicationId - The application id of the application from which the widgets will be deleted.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
widgets - The list of widgets to delete.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

                           String callingApplicationId,
                           AsyncCallback<ArrayList<Widget>> callback)
Retrieves the list of widgets from the specified application.

Parameters:

applicationId - The application id of the application from which the widgets will be retrieved.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

sendWidgetInput

public void sendWidgetInput(String placeId,
                            String applicationId,
                            String callingApplicationId,
                            WidgetInput widgetInput,
                            AsyncCallback<WidgetInput> callback)
Sends input to the specified application.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id of the application to which input will be sent.
applicationId - The application id of the application to which input will be sent.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
widgetInput - The WidgetInput that describes the input
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

Gets a list of applications of a place.

Parameters:

callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

getApplicationsList

public void getApplicationsList(String placeId,
                                String callingApplicationId,
                                boolean active,
                                AsyncCallback<ArrayList<Application>> callback)
Gets a list of applications of a place, filtered by it active status.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id to get information from.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
active - if true, gets list of active applications; if false, get list of inactive applications.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

getPlace

                     String callingApplicationId,
                     AsyncCallback<Place> callback)
Gets information about a specific place.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id to get information from.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

getPlacesList

public void getPlacesList(String callingApplicationId,
                          AsyncCallback<ArrayList<Place>> callback)
Gets a list of available places on the interaction manager.

Parameters:
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
callback - The callback instance to notify when the response comes back.

createChannel

public void createChannel(String placeId,
                          String applicationId,
                          String callingApplicationId,
                          AsyncCallback<ArrayList<WidgetInput>> listener)
Creates a communication channel with the interaction manager for synchronous communication with a specific application. Currently, the channel is used only to receive WidgetInput for an application.

Parameters:
placeId - The place id of the application which this channel will serve.
applicationId - The application id of the application which this channel will serve.
callingApplicationId - The application id of the application that is making the request.
listener - The listener for WidgetInput directed at the specified application.
